price: Ми нисмо створили небо и Земљу и оно што је између њих да се забављамо.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqnā al-samāa wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā lāʿibīna
